parameters.textBody:
=ü™ôYou currently have a total of {{ $json['Total points'] }} points.

üìàThat's a planned potential treasure of ‚Ç¨{{ $json['Planned Potential Value From'] }} ‚Äì ‚Ç¨{{ $json['Planned Potential Value To'] }} at fund culmination, which you can cash out or donate to a charity close to your heart.
=Fate has summoned you! Which adventure will you embark upon?
=‚öîÔ∏è That quest is not available. Choose another adventure.

=*How may I assist you?*

1. Show me the bounty board
2. Show me my on-going quests
3. Show me my points
4. Setup quest signals
=üîÆGreetings {{ $json.Trait }} {{ $json['Angel name'] }}.
=üó∫Ô∏èChoose a quest ID number to unveil its secrets.
=*0. Go back*
=*0. Go back*

=*Interested?* {{ $('Google Sheets - Bounty Board1').item.json['Interested?'] }}

*Click here:* {{ $('Google Sheets - Bounty Board1').item.json['Action link'] }}

=üìñThe scrolls reveal no active quests.

Seek a new adventure.
=üìñThese are your ongoing quests:

=üìú(1/4) How often do you wish to receive word of new quests?

1. Daily
2. Weekly
3. Bi-weekly
4. Monthly

=üìÖ(2/4) Which day shall the call to adventure reach you?

1. Monday
2. Tuesday
3. Wednesday
4. Tuesday
5. Friday
6. Saturday
7. Sunday

=(3/4) Which moment in the day best suits your journey?

1. In the morning (A.M.)
2. Afternoon/evening (P.M.)

parameters.textBody: =üèπWell done. Your settings are now locked and ready.

=A call to action shall reach you on a {{ $json['Reminder freq.'] }} basis.
Every {{ $json['Reminder day'] }} at {{ $json['Reminder hour'] }} {{ $json['Reminder period'] }}
=üß≠Your call to adventure has arrived. Behold this quest we have ready for you:

=Time to raise {{ $json.originalItem.Trait }} {{ $json.originalItem['Angel name'] }}.

You can also see the full bounty board by typing "Go"
